code: import React from'react';import{CardContainer,ProductImage,CardInfo,ProductName,ProductPrice,AddToCartButton}from'./ProductCardStyle';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faShoppingCart}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProductCard(props){var product=props.product,onAddProductToCart=props.onAddProductToCart,imagesUrl=props.imagesUrl;var handleAddToCart=function handleAddToCart(){if(onAddProductToCart&&typeof onAddProductToCart==='function'){onAddProductToCart(product.id);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductImage,{img:true,src:imagesUrl,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardInfo,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductName,{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductPrice,{children:["R$",product.value.toLocaleString('pt-BR',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AddToCartButton,{onClick:handleAddToCart,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faShoppingCart}),"Comprar"]})]})]});}
